mapper.insert: {CALL save_reservation( #{customerId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{hotelId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{startDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, typeHandler=com.sysone.ddogdog.customer.common.util.LocalDateTypeHandler}, #{endDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, typeHandler=com.sysone.ddogdog.customer.common.util.LocalDateTypeHandler}, #{count, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{price, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{canceled, jdbcType=NUMERIC, typeHandler=com.sysone.ddogdog.customer.common.util.BooleanTypeHandler}, #{createDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, typeHandler=com.sysone.ddogdog.customer.common.util.LocalDateTypeHandler}, #{id, mode=OUT, jdbcType=NUMERIC} )}
mapper.select: SELECT h.business_name,h.main_image,h.intro, a.full_address, r.id, r.start_date, r.end_date, r.count, r.price, r.create_date, r.canceled FROM hotels h INNER JOIN addresses a ON h.address_id = a.id INNER JOIN ( SELECT id, hotel_id, start_date, end_date, count, price, create_date, canceled FROM reservations WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} ) r ON r.hotel_id = h.id
